## Docs

- [docs](docs/README.md)

## Run

`cd src`

`dotnet run`

`dotnet run -- preview`

<!-- `dotnet run --environment "Development"` -->

<!-- `dotnet run --environment "Development" -- preview` -->

- http://localhost:5080
